roleset.name: copy or manufacture illegally
roleset.note: BOOTLEG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bootleg' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from bootleg.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: In September 1971 California officials seized ``bootlegged''lenses -- made by unlicensed companies -- after some showed traces ofbacteria.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John bootlegged Mary's entire collection of ABBA tapes.
example.arg: Mary's entire collection of ABBA tapes
